backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a task-reward system with user registration (10 coin signup bonus), task creation/completion, balance tracking, and transaction history using Map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 11 frontend files covering React components, pages, hooks, and styling for the earning app interface.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Earning App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication flow, login prompt screen, and route definitions for dashboard, tasks, and history pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component with sticky header, responsive navigation (desktop/mobile), sign-out button, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCard.tsx: Card component displaying user profile with total earnings badge, formatted principal ID, and member-since date with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Task display card with description, reward badge, completion status indicator, and action button to complete tasks with loading state.
Transaction list item card showing task completion details with formatted timestamp, task ID, and earned amount badge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an actor instance for backend communication, using Internet Identity for authentication and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing identity state and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching user profile and transactions, and a mutation hook for completing tasks with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes using OKLCH color space for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying user profile, stats cards (earnings, tasks, status), hero banner, and quick action buttons with 5-second polling for profile updates.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Tasks page showing a placeholder message indicating that tasks are being set up and will appear once added by administrators.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Transaction history page that displays a list of user transactions in reverse chronological order, with loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, border radius variables, custom shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for an Internet Computer earning app with Motoko backend and React frontend. Contains 8 completed features (authentication, dashboard, tasks, transactions, game components) and 2 pending feature requests for user profile system and game functionality.
